levels.description: Deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all nearby ground enemies, and cause them to <$ba.levitate>Levitate </><@ba.vup>{levitate}</> seconds, then bombard <@ba.vup>{multi_times}</> times, each hit dealing <@ba.vup>{multi_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all enemies in a small area around a random target
